issue.title: [Rust] Implement min/max kernels for BooleanArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10944](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10944). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While this operation is of very limited utility, for completness and uniformity I would like to have a min/max aggregation kernel that works for BooleanArrays. Currently we have ones for primitive value (e.g. numeric) arrays as well as strings, etc.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10944?focusedCommentId=17252404) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8946
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8946>
